column4: I have a folder full of deb packages... how can I make these into a repo for synaptic to use?
/var/cache/apt/archive is where the downloaded debs go, but if there not in the actuall repos you will probally need to install them manually
this computer doesn't have internet access at all, that's why I have the folder full of debs.
I'd like to add them into synaptic as a local repo, rather than double clicking and chasing deps for hours
